channel.title: Behance Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance

item.title: Characters collection - April 2013
item.description: This collection gathers several characters (along with some typography work and small elements) I did in recent times and in the past, but never released. The style of each character may be slightly different from one to the other because these characters were created for different projects.
item.content:encoded: This collection gathers several characters (along with some typography work and small elements) I did in recent times and in the past, but never released. The style of each character may be slightly different from one to the other because these characters were created for different projects.

item.title: CONFIDERI
item.description: CONFIDERI offers in-depth solutions to corporate, legal, tax, and financing issues, regarding organization, ownership, management of assets, and securing family and business wealth. After examining this industry?s current situation, it became evident that now is the right time to bring the brand to the market from a different angle, therefore bringing about a progressive approach. Our solution is to create an identity that demonstrates key company advantages, that secures the ?leader? image, which is strengthened with the refined name, ?Confideri?- from English. Confidence. The image created also evokes in the client a strong feeling of trust.
item.content:encoded: CONFIDERI offers in-depth solutions to corporate, legal, tax, and financing issues, regarding organization, ownership, management of assets, and securing family and business wealth. After examining this industry?s current situation, it became evident that now is the right time to bring the brand to the market from a different angle, therefore bringing about a progressive approach. Our solution is to create an identity that demonstrates key company advantages, that secures the ?leader? image, which is strengthened with the refined name, ?Confideri?- from English. Confidence. The image created also evokes in the client a strong feeling of trust.

item.title: Wide Sky Trailer
item.description: I made a game and I made a trailer. And I'm really tired. Wide Sky is now finally in the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id592925278?mt=8 During the making of all of this, I was fortunate enough to get to work with two impossibly talented people. Vasiliy Filatov made the music and most of the sound fx (the good ones) for the game. Lea Jurida then put the trailer to sound and music and brought it to life from its deathly and dark prenatal state. More info on the game: widesky-ios.com Vasiliy Filatov - Music, Main Sound Design for the game: http://www.basie.ru Lea Jurida - Music, Sound Design for the trailer: http://www.jurida.com/ Marcus Eckert - Game and Trailer: https://twitter.com/marcus_eckert p.s. 3GS support ist coming.
item.content:encoded: I made a game and I made a trailer. And I'm really tired. Wide Sky is now finally in the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id592925278?mt=8 During the making of all of this, I was fortunate enough to get to work with two impossibly talented people. Vasiliy Filatov made the music and most of the sound fx (the good ones) for the game. Lea Jurida then put the trailer to sound and music and brought it to life from its deathly and dark prenatal state. More info on the game: widesky-ios.com Vasiliy Filatov - Music, Main Sound Design for the game: http://www.basie.ru Lea Jurida - Music, Sound Design for the trailer: http://www.jurida.com/ Marcus Eckert - Game and Trailer: https://twitter.com/marcus_eckert p.s. 3GS support ist coming.

item.title: t-shirt printing
item.description: T-Shirt printing using traditional rubber stamps is a process that I innovated a few years ago for my current employer. The concept was a huge success and is used for large events. It's amazing to see the variation you get from print to print.
item.content:encoded: T-Shirt printing using traditional rubber stamps is a process that I innovated a few years ago for my current employer. The concept was a huge success and is used for large events. It's amazing to see the variation you get from print to print.

item.title: Younger than Jesus Artist Directory
item.description: Younger than Jesus Artist Directory introduces over 500 of the best artists under 33 years of age from around the world. It was assembled by a worldwide team of curators, writers, teachers, critics and artists during the research phase of the New Museum?s new triennial exhibition, ?Younger than Jesus?.
item.content:encoded: Younger than Jesus Artist Directory introduces over 500 of the best artists under 33 years of age from around the world. It was assembled by a worldwide team of curators, writers, teachers, critics and artists during the research phase of the New Museum?s new triennial exhibition, ?Younger than Jesus?.

item.title: Sticky Storm
item.description: With Sticky Storm, MINIMAL has conceptualized an intuitive productivity app for capturing, organizing, collaborating, and sharing ideas all within the cloud. It allows users to easily cross-pollinate and share content with a team, while tracking the evolution of the idea from beginning to end.
item.content:encoded: With Sticky Storm, MINIMAL has conceptualized an intuitive productivity app for capturing, organizing, collaborating, and sharing ideas all within the cloud. It allows users to easily cross-pollinate and share content with a team, while tracking the evolution of the idea from beginning to end.

item.title: Warde "Home Is a Quest"
item.description: Onesize created this 60 second, fully CG animated commercial for Warde, the biggest reseller of quality fabrics in the middle east and Africa and is known for it's quality and designs world-wide. LeoBurnett challenged Onesize to create a world made of fabrics in which all kinds of animals are on a quest for home.
item.content:encoded: Onesize created this 60 second, fully CG animated commercial for Warde, the biggest reseller of quality fabrics in the middle east and Africa and is known for it's quality and designs world-wide. LeoBurnett challenged Onesize to create a world made of fabrics in which all kinds of animals are on a quest for home.

item.title: Union Square
item.description: Union Square is a traffic intersection and national historic attraction, centrally located in Manhattan, New York. The square was built in 1882 and has ever since been a popular social area of events like: markets, cultural events, and political demonstrations. On 3 hectare, Union Square is home to more than 70,000 people, 900 retail shops, and has a versatile range of gastronomy and cultural establishments. Union Square Partnership is the civic organization that voluntarily cooperates with area businesses, residents, and cultural and academic institutions to ensure future growth and success. The program includes public safety, economic development, marketing, including beautification of Union Square Park. This redesign / rebranding is based on the target group's lack of overview of Union Squares opportunities, offers and businesses. Solved with an optimization of their information dissemination, through a new infographic visual identity. - Union Square Festival is an annual cultural event, which celebrates businesses of the area. A 3 day feast of gastronomy, art, and entertainment. The festival has been etablished as a permanent campaign, which indirect brands Union Square as a vibrant and exciting district to be living in. The visual identity of Union Square will have a contemporary colorful expression during the festival. Various posters and ads of maps will lead the audience to the Union Square area and make them aware of the festival's presences.
item.content:encoded: Union Square is a traffic intersection and national historic attraction, centrally located in Manhattan, New York. The square was built in 1882 and has ever since been a popular social area of events like: markets, cultural events, and political demonstrations. On 3 hectare, Union Square is home to more than 70,000 people, 900 retail shops, and has a versatile range of gastronomy and cultural establishments. Union Square Partnership is the civic organization that voluntarily cooperates with area businesses, residents, and cultural and academic institutions to ensure future growth and success. The program includes public safety, economic development, marketing, including beautification of Union Square Park. This redesign / rebranding is based on the target group's lack of overview of Union Squares opportunities, offers and businesses. Solved with an optimization of their information dissemination, through a new infographic visual identity. - Union Square Festival is an annual cultural event, which celebrates businesses of the area. A 3 day feast of gastronomy, art, and entertainment. The festival has been etablished as a permanent campaign, which indirect brands Union Square as a vibrant and exciting district to be living in. The visual identity of Union Square will have a contemporary colorful expression during the festival. Various posters and ads of maps will lead the audience to the Union Square area and make them aware of the festival's presences.

item.title: Bijenkorf "Wishbox"
item.description: CGI and postproduction done by Souverein Weesp photography Jeroen Hofman agency Selmore Creative Agency The woman, arms, mirror-table and products were all photographed. The wishbox was rendered and integrated into the photography.
item.content:encoded: CGI and postproduction done by Souverein Weesp photography Jeroen Hofman agency Selmore Creative Agency The woman, arms, mirror-table and products were all photographed. The wishbox was rendered and integrated into the photography.
